sentences.sContent: ...and you really felt anything was possible...
...girls went around in really short skirts...
...I had a really good stay here...
...all the time! I don't really remember working – of course...
...But I think the really successful negotiator is probably born with the sixth sense that may respond properly to the situation at hand...
...I prefer take-home essays because it is then really about the writing...
...It is really an honor for me to be your friend and I will cherish the goodwill you have showed to me wherever I go...
...It is really difficult to tell if assisted living is better than a nursing home...
Why don’t you tell us what really happened?
sentences.sCn: 你为什么不把真相告诉我们？

trans.tranOther: used when you are talking about what actually happened or is true, rather than what people might wrongly think
